title: India Is Offered Tiny Volume of Venezuelan Oil as Most Goes to U.S.
summary: Offers of Venezuelan crude to India are limited, and in small volumes, as most of the oil under U.S. control is heading to the United States, Indian refining executives told Reuters. Since the U.S. took control of Venezuela’s oil sales and authorized two of the world’s biggest independent traders, …

title: U.S. Natural Gas Prices Retreat After Rallying 117%
summary: U.S. natural gas prices dipped today amid profit-taking by traders, after soaring by over 117% in the five days to Monday, Bloomberg has reported, noting the benchmark jumped by 30% on Monday alone. Last week, gas prices went up by as much as 70% amid frigid weather that apparently took gas traders…
